name: logdown
description: Debug utility with markdown support that runs on browser and server

scripts.build: webpack && cpx dist/logdown.js example/lib && uglifyjs --compress --mangle  --screw-ie8 -- dist/logdown.js > dist/logdown.min.js && gzip dist/logdown.min.js --stdout --best > dist/logdown.min.js.gzip
